name: Bewear
description: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Big Throw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard your opponent’s Active Pokémon and all attached cards.
